data.title: True North Records
data.meta_description: The award-winning record label behind Bruce Cockburn, Buffy Sainte-Marie, Barney Bentall, Crystal Shawanda and Meredith Moon. Canadian singer-songwriters at their best.
data.meta_site_name: True North Records - Canada's Top Singer-Songwriters
data.text: Founded in 1969 by Bernie Finkelstein and featuring over 600 releases, 43 JUNO Awards and 37 gold and platinum records to its credit, True North is a unique Canadian recording company dedicated to fostering creativity among its artists. True North is distributed through the IDLA Associated Label Distribution network, whose international physical distribution partners are: Amped/AEC in the USA, Fontana North in Canada, IRD in Italy; Alive AG in Germany, Austria, and Switzerland; Proper Distribution in the UK & other European territories.
